sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-Spare data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Gulo Mäkäda, ṭabiya Koḵob Ṣәbaḥ, qušät Qärsäbär

note.desc: The religious site existed long before (the building of the church stands on the Aksumite burial place).
note.ab: Däbr. Tabots (7): Mary, Mädḫane ʿAläm, Michael, George, Gabriel, Trinity, one unidentified marble.

38 Mss. photographed: QSM-001 "Synaxarion"; QSM-002 "The Rite of the Holy Week"; QSM-003 "Four Gospels"; QSM-004 "Homily of St. Michael"; QSM-005 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; QSM-006 "Story of the Holy Trinity"; QSM-007 "Synaxarion"; QSM-008 "Miracles of Jesus"; QSM-009 "Vita of St. George"; QSM-010 "Missal"; QSM-011 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"; QSM-012 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"; QSM-013 "Missal"; QSM-014 "Homily of St. Michael"; QSM-015 "Missal"; QSM-016 "The Book of Liturgical Hymns"; QSM-017 "Miracles of Mary"; QSM-018 "Psalter"; QSM-019 "Collections of Prayers"; QSM-020 "Synoptic Lectionary for the Year"; QSM-021 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; QSM-022 "Missal"; QSM-023 "The Faith of the Fathers"; QSM-024 "Miracles of Mikaʾel"; QSM-025 "Vita of Täklä Haymanot"; QSM-026 "Prayer of Incense"; QSM-027 "Somä Dǝggwa"; QSM-028 "Book of Prayers"; QSM-029 "Homily of the Saviour of the World"; QSM-030 "Homily of John Chrysostomos"; QSM-031 "The Book of the Baptismal Rite"; QSM-032 "Homily of St. Gabriel"; QSM-033 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"; QSM-034 "Story of St. Mary"; QSM-035 "Homily of the Sabbath"; QSM-036 "Vita of ʾArägawi"; QSM-037 "Vita of ʾArägawi"; QSM-038 "Vita of Kiros"
